name: Snare Commando
prereq: Snare Crafting; Expert In Deception Or Intimidation
summary: Your snares are so befuddling that your victims rarely notice you slipping out of sight.
description:
Your snares are so befuddling that your victims rarely notice you slipping out of sight. If you have expert proficiency in Deception, you can Create a Diversion against the triggering creature. If you have expert proficiency in Intimidation, you can instead Demoralize the triggering creature. If you have both, choose one of the two effects.Traits

Kobold: A creature with this trait is a member of the kobold ancestry. Kobolds are reptilian humanoids who are usually Small and typically have darkvision. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by kobolds.
trigger: A creature fails or critically fails a save against your snare.
